模块 uk.ac.soton.comp1206
程序包 uk.ac.soton.comp1206.component

类 GameBlockCoordinate

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.component.GameBlockCoordinate
public class GameBlockCoordinate extends Object
Represents a row and column representation of a block in the grid. Holds the x (column) and y (row). Useful for use in a set or list or other form of collection.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器

    GameBlockCoordinate(int x, int y)
    Create a new GameBlockCoordinate which stores a row and column reference to a block
